pages.text: Spiritfire is a special type of fire that exists mostly in $(thing)The Other Place$() and does not harm living beings. It's special properties allow to use it to purify and convert certain materials by burning them, without consuming them. Making Spiritfire requires $(item)Demon's Dream Fruit$() and $(item)Flint and Steel$().
Throw $(item)Demon's Dream Fruit$() to the ground and light it on fire.
The main uses of Spiritfire are to convert $(item)Diamonds$() into $(item)Spirit Attuned Gems$(), and to purify impure chalk.
